website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular options from a trusted name in all-natural skin care.
pros: Brown sugar crystals delicately sweep away dry skin while natural oils lock in moisture
cons: Oily texture and tendency for liquid and grains to separate in container

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing! I suffer from strawberry legs (pores getting clogged and bumpy) and this product worked wonders to exfoliate and also moisturize. Although when I stopped using it my legs quickly became bumpy and dry which makes sense. The only pain is that you have to mix the product together every time you use it because the oil and sugar separate. Still I wish I had found this sooner and it’s defiantly worth the price
customer_reviews.author: garry

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, however, I found it at the store for half of what this was advertised for. The price shown is for the larger, actual full size, and not the size I received.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Freeman

customer_reviews.title: like a salt glow for home use
customer_reviews.text: Best Exfoileator out there in my opionion. Feels like wet sand on your body. Water will just bead onto and off yoyr skin as it leaves a silky feeling exiting the shower .. scrub in slow circular motions focusing on knees and elbows and anywhere else you please except for the face area. To harsh for tye face. Love love love this product! Happy scrubbing. A must buy! Summer V
customer_reviews.author: KVonHolten

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The seal was opened prior to arrival!!! The oil in it leaks everywhere in the package!!!! Useless stuff!!!! Waste of money and time!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sihui Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fresh products are good
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. But a bit pricey! Good for those bumps on arms. Lasts a long time as only a small amount is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy09

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this product. It leaves your skin smooth, soft and smelling delightful. No need for lotion after using it. Just don't tilt it after opening and let the oils spill out. :)
customer_reviews.author: malsabor

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but...
customer_reviews.text: This product really makes my skin feel so smooth but the product is very messy to use and if you don't store the container in a completely upright position, there is liquid that runs out of the jar in my shower. I like the prooduct so much I am willing to overlook any "buts" I might have. I love the smell of the product, too.
customer_reviews.author: BWJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It must have been old. Not the same quality as others I have bought. I'm using it but only because it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Theus

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this product for years so I was excited to start it again. Still works great & smells great in the shower but not much order when you dry off. I think it used to be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: My scrub has very little oil in it. Very dry. Should I add something?
customer_reviews.author: Betty Dunworth

customer_reviews.title: honey plus honey
customer_reviews.text: what a dirty concoction.Too heavy and stick like glue.Big no but I can't lie, it smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cezar Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: I just simply love love love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I just simply love love love this stuff. Great scrub for your body. Do not use on face. Smell love and last all day. Fresh, simple, clean and crisp~ Your body will be extremely soft all over I can't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Delaine Godin

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: I've been through the awful ones with plastic beads, this brown sugar polish is natural and much more effective. I use the Face Polish and Body Polish.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Laurin Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Body Scrub
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this for a while-smells awesome and makes your skin feel so smooth. A little pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: have been using it for years!
customer_reviews.text: The texture is great, it's just enough roughness to do the trick. the smell is exotic! your skin feels soft and moisturized, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect polish but best among other polishes
customer_reviews.text: Well the sugar is quite big in size so that first time when I used, it was not easy to use. But I still like the smoothness after i use the product. The smoothness of skin lasts really long.
customer_reviews.author: Yanghee Im

customer_reviews.title: It's a Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! Love the exfoliation! It moisturizes great too!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Aderhold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this body polish!! I use it on my feet and heel areas to get rid of the rough skin during this winter. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: shoegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product is just as advertised. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Helton

customer_reviews.title: brown sugar
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent product....especially is you live in a cold climate. i will re-order this product. tb...nc
customer_reviews.author: Toni Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I love to treat myself now and then. It's lasts long enough, does the trick so I don't mind the price. You can spend that much on a worthless meal out. I use it between showers on my feet in the summer, keeps them soft and ready for sandals
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful_Inhaler

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to make this at home
customer_reviews.text: The brown sugar body scrub smells nice and works effectively as a moisturizer and exfoliator, but it's incredibly expensive. After I used up the tub I bought on a splurge, I decided to see how hard it would be to duplicate at home. A few tablespoons of demerara sugar mixed with some olive oil and bingo! You have essentially the same product, while spending just pennies. If you're that attached to the scent, I suppose you could add a few drops of a citrus oil or maybe vanilla extract or something. Anyway, after seeing how easy it is to make my own, I'd be a fool to pay 60+ dollars for the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: equilibrist

customer_reviews.title: divine, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is divine...it smells like strawberries and brown sugar. Rough enough to exfoliate but soft enough to keep from abrasively damaging your skin. Has a finish that is oily but not the kind of oil to break out. Just to soften. I'd use it all over if it was cheaper. You only use a little, so it may be worth it, but go easy and it's going to last awhile. Sephora gives out decent sized samples if you ask! Divine stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Remy

product_meta.title: Fresh - The Original - Brown Sugar Body Polish (Full Size)
product_meta.description: Size:Full SizeBrown Sugar Body Polish is the original, natural sugar exfoliant and the unrivaled treatment for supremely soft skin after just one use. The formula includes: real brown sugar crystals, natural humectants that prevent moisture loss while gently buffing away dry skin cells.A superior blend of four precious oils of evening primrose, sweet almond, apricot kernel, and jojoba that nourish and moisturize the skin. Ginseng root extract and peppermint to invigorate the senses and revitalize skin cells. Citrus oils that help to brighten and tone the skin while leaving behind an unforgettable natural scent.
feature_bullets: Fresh The Original Brown Sugar Body Polish
